attributes.action: Hang his head in shame over the Governments continued deplorable treatment of Gurkahs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this country both civillian and military are sick of the continued deplorable treatment of Gurkahs. They fight and die for our way of life. Unlike the immigrants we allow in without contributing to our country - these brave men deserve to become residents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
